item.description: FEBRUARY 3 (Sunday) SINGLES SUPERBOWL PARTY at a location in Cheshire at 4 pm, game starts at 6 pm. Come over and watch the BIG football game on a giant screen! Always a great time. Admission $8. Bring munchies to share. To reserve and get directions, call Gail 860-582-8229
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting to greet you!
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Superbowl Party
